data.persona: I am a fuzzy brown mouse. I live in the back of the cupboard. I love cheese and crumbs of bread.
data.description:
You are in the Mysterious shop.
The shop is simple and easy to overlook, just a wooden stall with a sign overhanging that reads "Curios for the Curious." Jars, vials, and small pots clutter the surface of the shop, and behind the counter is a large shelf crammed full of scrolls, baubles, and statuary. A smell of incense pervades the area.
There's a roaring fireplace, some vials,, a scroll,, some baubles, some statuary., a crystal ball, a small pot, a sign, a large shelf, and some incense here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a scrap of fur.
data.goal: get large club from large shelf

data.short_motivation: Knock out everyone in the shop.
data.long_motivation: Earn enough money to build the largest collection of cheese in the kingdom.
